What is the significance of Kee in relation to the Human Project in *Children of Men*?
Options:
A. Kee is the only known pregnant woman in the world.
B. The Human Project aims to cure humanity's infertility.
C. Julian wanted to take Kee to the Human Project.
D. Kee is a scientist working on the Human Project.
Correct Answer: Kee is the only known pregnant woman in the world., The Human Project aims to cure humanity's infertility., Julian wanted to take Kee to the Human Project.

What strategies were employed to protect Kee in *Children of Men*?
Options:
A. Julian planned to take Kee to the Human Project.
B. Theo used a trick involving water on the floor to distract the guard.
C. Kee was essential for the Human Project's research.
D. Theo and Julian worked together to ensure Kee's safety.
Correct Answer: a) Julian planned to take Kee to the Human Project. and b) Theo used a trick involving water on the floor to distract the guard.
